snippet.title: AMBER MARSHALL SPEAKS ON TY’S DEATH,NOT WATCHING HEARTLAND AND SEASON 15
snippet.description:
Article Link Is Given Below:
https://upcomingseason.com/amber-marshall-and-ty-bordens-death/?fbclid=IwAR1O0cv0UeH6grV_tLS9qlRRLUekS4sMWTUeYO1W-TJRUWPYtZmqZpd6gko
The longest-running 1-hour Canadian drama series heartland is set to return on the 17th of October of this year. In the previous two seasons, the series has taken some unbelievable twist in its plotline. Like in season 14 we saw ty leaving us and later we saw lou breaking up with mitch.
So in today’s video we are going to Talk about amber marshall aka amy’s thought and her reaction when she heard the plot of ty,s death.
According to UPS article in an interview with maclean’s author aaron hutchins, marshall said that she has been asked questions about ty’s death and some fans have even expressed their condolence to ty and texted her to stay strong. So she has a message for all the heartland fans. She wants to make everybody clear and inform that ty is just a fictional character and the actor graham wardle who portrays ty borden is still alive. So there is nothing to worry about. She also explained that she is not wife of wardle in real life, but she admits to be a good friend of wardle. Then hutchin asked her, how was her reaction when she got to know graham had decided to quit the show. She said that she was surprised by his decision and initially thought graham was messing up his own career. But later she realized that Graham was born and raised in a place like Vancouver. Alberta’s heartland lifestyle would have been difficult for him to adapt and also he used to live far from the shooting location, so it was difficult for him to shoot the entire day and then travel back to his home. Also, he had various in his personal life so giving himself more time to explore, she thinks graham did what was best for him. She also said that had she been in graham’s boot, she would have quit the show years ago. From her words, it seems she has empathized with graham’s situation and has respected his decision to quit acting.
#amyfleming #ambermarshall #heartlandseason15
